mapper.insert: insert into shortweather(baseDate, fcstTime, category, fcstDate, fcstValue, nx, ny, updated, area) values(#{baseDate},#{fcstTime},#{category},#{fcstDate},#{fcstValue},#{nx},#{ny},0,#{area})
mapper.select: select * from shortweather where category in ("POP","PCP","REH","TMP","UUU","VVV","VEC","SKY") and area=#{area} and updated = 0
select * from shortweather where fcstDate=#{fcstDate} and fcstTime=#{fcstTime} and area=#{area} and updated = 0
